price: Na ͻyε ayεmyε ma n’awofoͻ, na ͻnyε ahomasoͻ (nipa, anaa) asobrakyeε.
arabic: وَبَرَّۢا بِوَٰلِدَيۡهِ وَلَمۡ يَكُن جَبَّارًا عَصِيّٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wabarran biwālidayhi walam yakun jabbāran ʿaṣiyyan
